document_data.name: Dezlentyr
document_data.symbol: A white field with a tree over a red field with white stripes and an anchor
document_data.mainbody: The '''Dezlentyr''' ({{Pronounce|dez|LEN|teer|refs=}}) [[Nobility of Waterdeep|noble house]] of [[Waterdeep]] was a prominent family within the city who rose to prominence during the 13{{th}} century [[DR]]. They were renowned for their expertise as caravan masters, traders and explorers, having established a number of harbors in coastal settlements on a number of islands located throughout the Realms.{{Cite web enhancement/Noble Houses of Waterdeep|3}}
document_data.Base of Operations: [[File:Sea Ward-Assumbar-Cassalanter-Dezlentyr-Eirontalar Villa.png|thumb|right|270px|''Map showing the location of the Dezlentyr Villa (labeled $51) ''circa'' 1372 DR.'']] The family owned a villa in the [[Sea Ward of Waterdeep|Sea Ward]] on the southeast corner of [[Delzorin Street]] and [[Feather Street]]. They also had holdings in the [[Starspur]] county in the nation of [[Tethyr]].
document_data.Notable Members:
*[[Arlos Dezlentyr]]: Lord and patriarch of House Dezlentyr during the 14{{th}} century
*[[Erin Cassalanter Dezlentyr]]: Lady of the house, and the second wife of Lord Arlos
*[[Corin Dezlentyr]]: The [[half-elf]] heir to the family's fortune
*[[Corinna Dezlentyr]]: Naval commander in the Tethyrian Reclamation in 1368 DR, Countess of Starspur in Tethyr and Royal Admiral in command of the Tethyrian navy sometime after 1368 DR<ref>
